title: Try these 3 websites to book a vacation if Airbnb is too tough
body: With spring here and summer just a few weeks away, now is the time to plan for .You may be desperate to get away for a bit and itching to cure some of those winter blues. A safe vacation might be the perfect way to do that, especially with more and more people getting the COVID-19 vaccine. Travel pods are becoming a trendy way of vacationing, too.A couple ways to safely vacation? Book a or take . The perk of home rentals is you can have the whole place to yourself without worrying about other people nearby, like you would have in a hotel or resort.
